= Scene 19 ðŸŽƒðŸŽƒðŸŽƒðŸŽƒ

Hero at Hills : Spoorty recover avvadaniki peddha time patledhu.. kani nenu teesukunna two years time matram aagatledhu . Script raasukunna , inka aa Aman(clip of him saying , nenu camera handle chesta..),  ma golu..(editing nenu chusukuta le Maya)


<Ashesh and me discussing about hero>
<In vuda park , hero comes late , so me and heroine love scene will take up here>
Ash: Vadu ravadaniki late avuhadhi anta..
Maya : Helloâ€¦
Ash : Maya kadha .. Hi.. nenu amanâ€¦
Maya: hey Hi.. Arjun nee gurinchi eppudu cheppaledhu ..
<ðŸ˜‚>
Maya : inka..
Arjun: Nenu atu veltunna..
Maya : Would you mind if i join ?
Arjun : ofcourse .. nuvvu ?
Asheesh : you guys carry on..
Arjun : <Smiling and in mind.. thanks ra..>
Ash : <smiling and in mind ..aa matram ardam chesukolena..>
Maya : hello.. padhaâ€¦
<Goes near a tree and hero sits and gives his hand >
Maya : oh.. okay..!


 



Asheesh : aipoindha..
< Hero gets up>
<Asheesh to Maya>
Asheesh : Disturb Chesana?
Maya : No, Not at all..
Asheesh : Sai vacchadu ..,
Arjun :  sai aaâ€¦
Asheesh : Ninna cheppa ga..
<Arjun walks to himâ€¦shake hands , introduces each other>
Sai : Ninna Aman naku script mail chesadu 
Arjun : Ya goodâ€¦Andhulo 13th scene manam cheyyabotunnamâ€¦ mee frnd ee camera anukondi ..
Sai : good , okay ..ready <sees his mobile and reads the dialogue >, konchem aggressive scene la undhi ..
Arjun : ha.. meeru konchem kopam ga untaru ..,ready?
Sai : All good ok 
< Action..>
Sai : Rolling  camera emi undadha?
Asheesh  : Camera roll avtundhi , Meeru act cheyyandi.
Sai : Chudu <bangs his head> idhi correct kadhu 
Arjun : cutâ€¦.Antha agression enduku andi.. Konchem real ga , natural ga.. <take again> action
Sai : Chuduidhi correct kadhuâ€¦(no gap reads it..)
Arun : cutâ€¦ 
Asheesh : Bro.. mari numb ga vacchindhi expression ..comon , inka better..
Sai : Chudu(blows air out of the mouth)
Arjun : chustunnaâ€¦  poga oduluthav entra..
< throws his papers.. slowly like dropping>

<walks backâ€¦.maya , asheesh come to him>

Maya: Arjun ..Comon.. Nee mood batte set lo vunna valla mood depend ayyi vuntadhi,  voice thone problem kadha, dubbing appudu chuddam
Golu  : avunu ra , editing appudu yedhyna magic cheyyocchu ..
< comes back >
Arjun : clip okayâ€¦.(inaudible)

< Camera goes backâ€¦.>
